reviewText: Now the Abyss Collection is Complete!
A must-buy for Tales of Junkies :D
It's nice i like the anime I played the game and that was pretty awesome
Must watch for every tales fan
A very carefully thought out series with very interesting twists in the plot and what you think to be really happening inside the characters lives or of their past. Highly recommend this series.

I am in love with this collection. The bonus manga is just beyond perfect. Wished we could get more of the mangas through collections like this but at least I have two of them from buying the limited editions for this amazing anime.

Continuing its precedent set down by volume 1, the OVA moves along at a brisk pace and lands us in the Qlipoth and explains everything quite succintly so that viewers who never even played the game can understand the complex nature of the world these characters live in and how the overall dynamics of the world function. We finally start to see a massive change in Luke and the cutting of his hair signifies that change outwardly as he struggles to decide who he wants to be. A great start to a character arc that will be fulfilled in the end.
